General.Name: Lansdowne Oil & Gas
General.Description: Lansdowne Oil & Gas plc, an independent oil and gas company, focuses on the exploration and development of oil and gas reserves in the Irish Celtic Sea. The company holds rights in the 2/07 Helvick and 1/11 Barryroe exploration licenses located in the North Celtic Sea basin of the south coast of Ireland. Lansdowne Oil & Gas plc was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.
